bio: I am currently pursuing a master's degree in software engineering at Northeastern University, where I am learning and applying advanced concepts and skills in software design, development, testing, documentation, and process improvement. I am passionate about creating high performance scalable software and learning new technologies on the go.

2.description: Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering

1.name: Nubewell Networks
1.description: Enhanced the security infrastructure for over 900+ customer locations with a high-performance, highly scalable/reliable Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) network security solution.

2.name: Ribbon Communications
2.description: Designed and developed the DPI (deep-packet inspection) engine that analyzes and generates intelligent data from real-time traffic captured on 4G VoLTE, VoWifi and IMS networks.

1.name: Cloud Native Application for Peak Performance
1.tech_stack_used: Go, PostgresQL, Cloud(AWS, GCP), Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Packer
1.description: Containerized a python microservice and deployed to Kubernetes using CI/CD pipeline and enabled the service for autoscaling to handle traffic spikes using Kubernetes horizontal pod autoscaling. Added monitors to the service to detect high resource utilization, latency and errors. Currently, the repository is Private :(

2.name: A Keyless Approach to Home Security using Internet of Things
2.description: Engineered a highly cost-efficient intelligent home security system leveraging Raspberry Pi technology. Developed a data-driven door unlocking system, leveraging facial recognition technology and a mobile application, enhancing security measures and improving accessibility for authorized personnel.

3.name: Spotify Clone
3.description: Java application which returns the albums of the specified artists.

4.name: Go application for Health-Check DB
4.description: Golang web application to implement health check for Postgres Database Connection

5.name: CRUD on DynamoDB
5.description: A web application to execute CRUD on Dynamo through REST APIs

6.name: Stock Management System

7.name: Hash Table in C

1.description: First author of a highly influential paper published in IJRASET, generating over 3,000 downloads and establishing it as one of the most referenced papers in 2020, contributing to the advancement of knowledge in the field
